org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.impl

Class TextContentVariants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.impl.TextContentVariants
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeContainer, TextContent

    public class TextContentVariants
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextContent
    Container holding multiple text content version / variants Also implements the TextContent interface by accessing the first (main) text content variant.
    Author:
    clc

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TextContentVariants.TextContentVariant
      TextContent implementation representing one version / variant of a page layout object's text content.

      • reomveTextContentVariant

        public void reomveTextContentVariant(int index)
        Removes the text content variant at the given index, if there are two or more variants. One text content variant has to exist at all times.
